title: Alt Tab?
body:
Hi, I'm having a issue with my LoL client, I've recently updated my system substantially, the game play is perfect with high graphics etc. BUT when I'm in game and have to alt tab for whatever reason it is and tab back into the client the screen acts like it's in window mode and my left click instead of movement pings and my right click is the movement and I can't press space to screen lock back to my champion... after a while it comes back to normal but I have never had this sort of trouble before on my old system with alt tabbing?

 I'm currently running Windows 8.1 and this is the first I'm running it.. could that be the issue?

replies.body:
>Windows 8.1

That's your issue right there. Riot haven't actually official supported Windows 8. It's not in the minimum system requirements (last I checked, at least).

Also, did you by any chance install any keyboard drivers?
Ahhh okay, well the problem seems to have fixed itself automatically without me doing anything. But thank you for the reply :)

Woah, one month ago.

....

Well it's good to see that your problem was fixed. Thank you for letting me know! (it could have been in the form of an update to your drivers)
